article.class: group post-94 page type-page status-publish hentry

h3.span: No in-person Education for the remainder of the school year — eLearning will continue

div.h3:
.
MEAL PICK UP moved to FRIDAY not Wednesday of this week

p.strong: Details of Meal Pick Up Change READ HERE

h4.strong: Tonight’s 6:30pm Board Meeting is available online (click here). The community is encouraged to attend online due to the COVID19 virus in order to reduce the chance of spread. Thank you!

p.strong: ALL facilities will be locked and playgrounds closed

span.span: El Paso County Public Health Website

strong.span: District Feeding Program for Children Under 18

h4.span: We offer a grab and go feeding program every Wednesday. Details Here

span.a: April 16, 2020 Parent Communication – no in-person education for the remainder of the school year

a.strong: March 30, 2020 Parent Communication – Materials Pick Up Details

strong.a: March 25, 2020 Parent Communication – eLearning Plan Details

div.p: Budget development is underway. The state is facing a $1-2B shortfall for the next fiscal year. This will have a negative impact on state revenues for school districts. The initial assumption is to see a reduction in state revenue of 1% from this current year’s revenue. The Colorado legislature will finalize the funding in the School Finance Act by the end of May. Once identified we will be able to finalize the 2020-2021 budget. The documents for the 2020-2021 budget development are here for your review, feedback, input and questions. Please participate in one of the upcoming community feedback virtual calls or email HanoverSD28@gmail.com.
